job.title: Software Development Engineer
job.description: pemIf you are a Colorado resident and this role is a fieldbased or remote role you may be eligible to receive additional information about the compensation and benefits for this role which we will provide upon request  You may contact 8883677223 option 5 for assistancebrbremstrongYour ChallengestrongppThe Software Development Engineer 3 position provides the successful candidate with an immediate opportunity to be involved with the manufacture of technology that is helping to save lives improve patient outcomes and reduce the cost of medicine across the globe The technology is a cornerstone in the Philips Healthtech portfolio and has proven to be elusive to our competitors As an international organization Philips is well placed to offer a broad range of technical and leadership opportunities in various organizations throughout the worldbrbrstrongYour TeamstrongppThis role will be a part of the Ultrasound Software Development team in Cambridge MAbrbrstrongOur OfferstrongppAt Philips we are driven by our mission to improve the lives of 25 billion people by 2030 and every day we move closer to achieving our goal by creating cuttingedge solutions that lead to confident diagnosis improved care and increased quality of life for patients Thanks to our employees who share our passion for improving lives we are at the forefront of the Healthcare industry leading in image guided interventions ultrasound patient monitoring cardiology informatics sleep therapy and respiratory care We enable our employees to create a legacy in life through their work and support their development through peoplecentric learning total rewards and personalized development planning programsbrbrstrongWe are Looking ForbrstrongpullipBS or MS in Computer Science Computer Engineering Electrical Engineering or equivalentplilipAt least four years experience in software spandevelopmentengineeringspan including requirements analysis software development installation integration evaluation enhancement maintenance testing and problem spandiagnosisresolutionspan The individual must be able to communicate directions and provide guidance to junior engineers as requiredplilipFamiliarity with embedded system development a plusplilipExtensive Experience with objectoriented programming languages eg C design and codingplilipSignal image processing experience preferred but not requiredplilipAbility to analyze and solve complex problems Strong desire to learn and adapt to new technologies and challengesplilipKnowledge of software development lifecycleplilipStrong interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to interface in a crossdisciplinary manner including engineers product managers and clinical specialistsplilipSelfmotivated individual with good organizational and time management skillsplilipFamiliarity with medical devices andor working in a regulated environment a plusbrbrpliulstrongWhy
